title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Pizza Cookbook
description: Host the ultimate pizza party with this creative cookbook of delicious recipes inspired by the heroes of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles. Everyone knows that Leonardo, Raphael, Donatello, and Michelangelo love to munch on delicious pizza when they’re not fighting crime and saving New York City from destruction. This charming book offers countless innovative and mouth-watering pizza recipes to inspire TMNT fans in the kitchen. An eclectic collection of delectable recipes, The Official Pizza Cookbook includes special vegetarian, meat-lover, New York City–style, Californian, Italian, and high-end gourmet selections, as well as pairing tips that are bound to impress dinner guests. This gnarly cookbook is the perfect gift for anyone seeking to take a TMNT-themed party to the next level. © 2016 Viacom International Inc. and Viacom Overseas Holdings C.V.  All rights reserved.  Nickelodeon, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, and all related titles, logos, and characters are trademarks of Viacom International Inc. and Viacom Overseas Holdings C.V. Based on the characters created by Peter Laird and Kevin Eastman.
author: Peggy Paul Casella
